companyName: Eaton Vance Oaktree Diversified Credit NextShares
description:
The investment seeks total return.
 The fund invests in securities and other instruments to establish investment exposures to credit markets around the world. It invests at least 80% of its net assets (plus any borrowings for investment purposes) in credit-related investments (the “80% Policy”). For purposes of this 80% Policy, “credit-related investments” are fixed income, variable rate, and floating-rate debt investments as well as derivatives that provide exposure to such investments.
